Hey there, I'm a junior web developer with a burning passion for coding and a whole lot of enthusiasm! I've decided to make a career change and dive headfirst into the world of web development.

I'm all about learning from the pros and soaking up their wisdom to level up my skills so I'm eager to join a team or company to glean insights from seasoned professionals and enhance my skills.

My positive attitude and previous experiences have taught me to be a valuable team player. I'm a hands-on learner, so I've got a bunch of projects under my belt that I'd love to show off.
